a.id AS "id", a.open_id AS "openId", a.name AS "name", a.sort AS "sort", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.begin_time AS "beginTime", a.end_time AS "endTime", a.age AS "age", a.grade AS "grade"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users( open_id, cdkey_id, begin_time, end_time, name, sort, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, age, grade ) VALUES ( #{openId}, #{cdkeyId}, #{beginTime}, #{endTime}, #{name}, #{sort}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{age}, #{grade} )
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET open_id = #{openId}, cdkey_id = #{cdkeyId}, begin_time = #{beginTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, name = #{name}, sort = #{sort}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, age = #{age}, grade = #{grade} WHERE id = #{id}
